TEXT.TITLE: DAMON <DMN> UNIT TO MANAGE CLINICAL LAB
TEXT.BODY:
Damon Corp said its Damon Clinical Laboratories division has agreed to manage theday-to-day operations of the clinical laboratory at Suburban
Hospital in Hinsdale, Ill. Reuter
